Workflow.Name: [Operation Activity Risk Scores] Check for updated Risk Score
Workflow.Description:
For AvSec Risk Scores this scheduled flow will check if the Risk Score Trigger matches the Risk Score in Operation Activity Risk Score. If it doesn't match it will be updated.
This is done to trigger another flow [Operation Activity Risk Scores] Update Risk Rating
